body: Live from my #kitchen! Making #homemadepasta for the first time—let’s see how this goes! Any tips for a first-timer? #cooking #foodie

comments.body: This is awesome! Make sure you knead the dough really well. It should be smooth before you roll it out!
@78787 Thanks for the tip! Kneading is harder than I thought—definitely getting a workout here!
Don’t forget to let the dough rest for a bit after kneading! It makes it easier to work with when you roll it out.
@89898 Oh good to know! I’ll let it rest while I prep the sauce. Do you have a go-to pasta sauce?
@67676 Definitely marinara with lots of garlic and basil. Simple but so good!
Are you using a pasta machine or doing it all by hand? Rolling it out by hand can be tricky but worth it!
@56565 Doing it all by hand! It’s definitely tricky, but I think it’s turning out okay so far. Fingers crossed!
Make sure you dust the dough with plenty of flour when rolling it out, so it doesn’t stick to everything!
@45454 Great tip! I was just about to start rolling it out—definitely don’t want it sticking. Flour at the ready!
Fresh pasta is going to taste amazing! Are you making any garlic bread to go with it?
@23232 That’s a great idea! I wasn’t planning on it, but now I might have to! Fresh pasta and garlic bread—perfect combo.
